name: Dominic Petty
offering: Specializes in Dominic solutions and services with expert guidance
what_you_do: Monkhouse & Company helps founders scale their businesses sustainably by providing structured growth strategies and models, ensuring they maintain control and well-being during rapid expansion.
who_you_serve: They serve founder-CEOs of companies experiencing significant growth, particularly those scaling from 50 to 500 employees.
current_projects: Half-day workshop on scaling businesses, limited to 16 spots.
social_proof: Dominic Monkhouse has scaled two tech firms from zero to £30 million in under five years and has worked with over 100 companies.
bio: Dominic Monkhouse has scaled two tech firms from zero to £30 million in under five years and has worked with over 100 companies.
business_focus: Monkhouse & Company helps founders scale their businesses sustainably by providing structured growth strategies and models, ensuring they maintain control and well-being during rapid expansion. (business scaling)
signature_programs: CEO Mentoring, CEO2, Two Day Week CEO Blueprint
